text: 23.12: Jop 22.29 naŋga, Snd 15.33 naŋga, 29.23 naŋga, Ese 21.26 naŋga, Lu 14.11 naŋga, 18.14 naŋga, Je 4.6 naŋga, 1 Pi 5.5Kru nuŋandɨ ñɨmbi tɨhuyahɨrɨmandɨ hama, Got andɨti ñɨmbi manɨman mɨŋga kɨyɨmandɨ. Ara kru nuŋandɨ ñɨmbi taŋguti mɨŋgurɨmandɨ hama, Got andɨti ñɨmbi aru naŋga mɨŋga kɨyɨmandɨ, vami.
